preference.name: TCAA101_num_of_bvrs_to_save_per_call
preference.preference_description: Through this option it is possible to limit the number of BVRs to be created or updated through a single SOA call. If the number of BVRs involved in a single save operation exceeds the number specified in this option, multiple SOA calls will be performed. See TCAA Installation Guide for details. Possible values: - 0 or any negative number: all the BVRs involved in the save operation are created or updated with a single SOA call. - Any positive number: this will be the maximum number of BVRs saved in a single SOA call. The default value is: 500.
